messages.subject: Question for Pam S.
messages.msgSnippet: Pam, I m involved in another list that is all about linking unschoolers all over the world. This comment came up when I posted a link to NHEN The very reason
messages.messageBody:
Pam,
I'm involved in another list that is all about linking unschoolers all over
the world. This comment came up when I posted a link to NHEN


"The very reason I do not support NHEN. A parent that sends their child to
public school full time but does homework with their child in the evening
(which is mandatory in most states) is considered homeschooling by NHEN.
That I can not agree with."

Is this true? I never got the idea that they supported this.


Ren
"Knowledge will not always take the place of simple observation."
~Arnold Lobel
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
